title: How do I use my B1 Bluetooth headset to answer or decline calls?
answer:
When your phone is connected to your B1, your B1 will vibrate in case of coming calls and display the caller's name or phone number.
If the Bluetooth headset ison the B1, it is assumed by default that you will answer the call on yourphone. If you want to answer the call on your B1, take the Bluetooth headsetoff from the B1 and press the side button to answer the call. To decline thecall, press and hold the side button for 3 seconds.
